recommended_movies: Cook the Thief His Wife & Her Lover, The (1989)
Faces of Death: Fact or Fiction? (1999)

simulated_ratings.title: Cook the Thief His Wife & Her Lover, The (1989)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Stylish but cruel and hard to sit through—the abuse and nastiness smothered any romance for me.

simulated_ratings.title: Excalibur (1981)
simulated_ratings.feeling: The mythic sweep impressed me, but the surreal heaviness kept me at arm’s length.

simulated_ratings.title: Rocky Horror Picture Show, The (1975)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Campy, catchy, and delightfully weird—more fun than scary for me.

simulated_ratings.title: Faces of Death 6 (1996)

simulated_ratings.title: Big Hit, The (1998)

simulated_ratings.feeling: Silly creature antics with horror beats I just don’t like.
